indetPluralNounPhrase(locational)grammar

en_us.t[6024]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A plural noun phrase with a locational qualifier. Note that even though the overall phrase is plural (and so the main underlying noun phrase is plural), the location phrase itself must always be singular.

grammar indetPluralNounPhrase(locational) :   ContainerNounPhraseProd
